recruitment_agreement: I agree to the processing of personal data provided in this document for realising the recruitment process pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act of 10 May 2018 (Journal of Laws 2018, item 1000) and in agreement with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation).

about.title: About me
about.text: I have been writing code professionally for two years, and before starting my first job as a programmer, I spent one year at self-study. I can create fast and responsive pages with modern technologies. I have been learning new features all the time to provide the best solutions.

description.text: Creating i editing web pages, using technologies such as: HTML, CSS, Javascript, TailwindCss, Alpine.js
Migration from the old to the new version of CMS
Support for customers from Poland and abroad
Conducting personal and group classes for children

items.name: 4dmind.com
items.description: The website of a Polish company specializing in digital products, where I had the pleasure to work. It is my first website that I built commercially as part of learning CMS Statamic.

items.name: highlandsolutions.com
items.description: The website of a US company specializing in digital products. One of the nicest websites I have created. I was most satisfied with the parallax effect at the bottom of the page, even though it is not complicated.

items.name: rapidrobotics.com
items.description: The website of a US company specializing in building industrial robots. The website was initially built in React, which had a negative impact on SEO. There were also a lot of animations that slowed down the website. The site was rewritten using CMS Statamic.
